devdoc.details: Curve LP Tokens unwrapping IT IS NOT PART OF THE PROTOCOL. SILO CREATED THIS TOOL, MOSTLY AS AN EXAMPLE.

InvalidCurvePriceProviderLPTokenPair().details: Revert if we are not able to get the pool coins by provided curve LP token

InvalidFetchersRepository().details: Revert on a false sanity check with `Ping` library

InvalidOrNotSupportedLPToken().details: Revert if we are not able to get LP Token pool details from the price provider

Unsupported().details: Revert on a `swapAmountOut` call as it in unsupported

towardsAsset(address,uint256).details: As Curve LP Tokens can be collateral-only assets we skip the implementation of this function

returns.amountOut: Amount of the `tokenOut` that we received
returns.tokenOut: A token that the `_asset` has been converted to

FETCHERS_REPO().notice: Curve LP Tokens details fetchers repository
